title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Hostile Aircraft: No Casualties Reported in Northern Intrusions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following alerts of the intrusion of hostile aircraft operated in the north of the country at 8:14, air defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target that crossed from Lebanese territory. There are no casualties.

Shortly thereafter, additional alerts were activated regarding the intrusion of hostile aircraft in several other areas in the north of the country. Two suspicious aerial targets were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in an open area near Beit Hillel. There are no casualties.

Attached is documentation of the interception of the suspicious aerial target: https://bit.ly/4bwUegX
